statements: SELECT * FROM ParentalContactPreferences;
SELECT parent_name, email, phone_number FROM ParentalContactPreferences WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, parent_name, preferred_contact_method FROM ParentalContactPreferences ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM ParentalContactPreferences WHERE preferred_contact_method = 'Email' AND last_contact_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT parent_name AS 'Parent Name', phone_number AS 'Phone Number' FROM ParentalContactPreferences WHERE email IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM ParentalContactPreferences WHERE parent_name = 'Alice'
SELECT parent_name, email, phone_number FROM ParentalContactPreferences ORDER BY parent_name DESC
SELECT * FROM ParentalContactPreferences WHERE preferred_contact_method LIKE '%email%' AND last_contact_date >= '2021-01-01'
SELECT DISTINCT parent_name, email FROM ParentalContactPreferences WHERE last_contact_date < '2021-10-01'
SELECT parent_name, phone_number FROM ParentalContactPreferences WHERE last_contact_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01'
SELECT * FROM ParentalContactPreferences;
SELECT parent_name, parent_email FROM ParentalContactPreferences WHERE parent_id = 1;
SELECT parent_name, parent_phone, preferred_communication_method FROM ParentalContactPreferences ORDER BY parent_name DESC;
SELECT parent_id, communication_date, communication_content FROM CommunicationLog WHERE parent_id = 3 AND communication_method = 'Email';
SELECT parent_name, communication_content FROM ParentalContactPreferences JOIN CommunicationLog ON ParentalContactPreferences.parent_id = CommunicationLog.parent_id;
SELECT parent_name, parent_email, parent_phone FROM ParentalContactPreferences WHERE parent_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM ParentalContactPreferences WHERE parent_phone IS NOT NULL ORDER BY parent_name ASC;

SELECT parent_name, communication_date, communication_content FROM ParentalContactPreferences JOIN CommunicationLog ON ParentalContactPreferences.parent_id = CommunicationLog.parent_id WHERE parent_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY communication_date DESC;

SELECT parent_name, communication_method, communication_content FROM ParentalContactPreferences JOIN CommunicationLog ON ParentalContactPreferences.parent_id = CommunicationLog.parent_id ORDER BY communication_method, parent_name;

SELECT parent_id, parent_name, COUNT(log_id) AS number_of_communications FROM ParentalContactPreferences LEFT JOIN CommunicationLog ON ParentalContactPreferences.parent_id = CommunicationLog.parent_id GROUP BY parent_id HAVING COUNT(log_id) > 2;
SELECT * FROM ParentalContactPreferences;
SELECT parent_name, email, phone_number FROM ParentalContactPreferences;
SELECT parent_id, parent_name FROM ParentalContactPreferences WHERE email IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM CommunicationPreferences WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT communication_type, delivery_channel, message FROM CommunicationPreferences ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM ParentalContactPreferences;
SELECT parent_name, email, phone_number FROM ParentalContactPreferences ORDER BY parent_name DESC;
SELECT parent_id, email FROM ParentalContactPreferences WHERE email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT p.parent_id, p.parent_name, c.communication_type, c.timestamp FROM ParentalContactPreferences p INNER JOIN CommunicationPreferences c ON p.parent_id = c.parent_id;

SELECT p.parent_name, d.channel_name FROM ParentalContactPreferences p INNER JOIN CommunicationPreferences c ON p.parent_id = c.parent_id INNER JOIN DeliveryChannels d ON c.delivery_channel = d.channel_name;
SELECT * FROM ParentalContactPreferences;
SELECT parent_id, email_contact FROM ParentalContactPreferences ORDER BY parent_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM EmailContacts WHERE parent_id = 1;
SELECT parent_id, phone_number FROM SMSContacts WHERE phone_number LIKE '123%';
SELECT parent_id, contact_number FROM PhoneContacts ORDER BY contact_number ASC;
SELECT * FROM ParentalContactPreferences;
SELECT parent_id, email_contact FROM ParentalContactPreferences WHERE email_contact = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM EmailContacts JOIN ParentalContactPreferences ON EmailContacts.parent_id = ParentalContactPreferences.parent_id WHERE parent_id = 1;
SELECT parent_id, phone_contact FROM ParentalContactPreferences WHERE phone_contact = TRUE ORDER BY parent_id DESC;

SELECT pc.parent_id, ec.email_address, sc.phone_number, ph.contact_number FROM ParentalContactPreferences pc LEFT JOIN EmailContacts ec ON pc.parent_id = ec.parent_id LEFT JOIN SMSContacts sc ON pc.parent_id = sc.parent_id LEFT JOIN PhoneContacts ph ON pc.parent_id = ph.parent_id;
SELECT * FROM ParentalContactPreferences;
SELECT parent_name, email, phone_number FROM ParentalContactPreferences WHERE sms_opt_in = TRUE;
SELECT parent_name, email FROM ParentalContactPreferences WHERE sms_opt_in = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM PhoneCallPreferences WHERE receive_calls = TRUE;
SELECT notification_type, notification_timestamp FROM NotificationHistory ORDER BY notification_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM ParentalContactPreferences WHERE id = 1;
SELECT parent_name, email FROM ParentalContactPreferences WHERE sms_opt_in = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM EmailPreferences WHERE email_updates = FALSE;
SELECT parent_id, sms_notifications FROM SmsPreferences WHERE parent_id = 2;
SELECT DISTINCT notification_type FROM NotificationHistory WHERE notification_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
